title: Reservations for A/L practical’s; Department of Education
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Department of Education noted that the date and time should be reserved on Saturday (7) for practical examinations scheduled to be held today for the GCE Advanced Level candidates.
Due to the Hartal taking place in the country candidates could NOT attend practical exams.
The Sinhala and Tamil medium drama and practical examinations were scheduled to be held today (6).
The Commissioner General of Examinations, L.M.D. Dharmasena said the relevant date and time must be obtained from the respective center for the practical examination.
Opposition MPs confronted by Angry protestors after parliament sittings adjourned
